overview: A video diary from the "Return to Paradise" tour, which saw the bombastic stadium rockers reunited after thirteen years of solo projects. Filmed on 1996's Autumnal Equinox -- a fittingly mystical date for a group so concerned with nature and magic -- their enthusiastic performance features prog rock staples like "Show Me The Way," "Grand Illusion," and "Come Sail Away."
title: Styx - Return to Paradise
